reviews.review:
There are many hackers in the game... and In December 2018 I got banned for hacking :tired: 

I made a support requested where I was told I would never be unbanned and they didn't accept this type of behavior in the game(hacking)...

3 days later in January 2019 I have unbanned with the reason false positive... after such a rude accusation, there was no sorry or anything.

i made the mistake of wall hacking 1 time and got perma banned and cant play the game or at the least move items after 909 hours of playing this game i didnt get a single warning and thats really messed up. i understand that it was wrong but everybody makes mistakes and they dont care about that. this game was great a couple years ago but now is just a like a prison. thanks valve.

Everything about this game is pretty fun. The competitive mode is my favorite and it is one of the best fps games I have ever played.

Even though I raged quite a bit playing this game (mostly due to either bad teammates or incredibly well playing opponents - possibly cheaters - or the broken hitreg), this game remains the most played game in my library and can be incredibly fun when not solo-queuing and not playing with cheaters. I wouldn't recommend this game to the short-tempered, but with enough patience it's possible to have a lot of fun.
Good game, very competitive and explicit community!
Still one of the best fps games, has some of the cleanest graphics even though it's from 2012.

Bring back the old low settings! The update has had a very detrimental effect on fps. Developers return everything as before or add the option to return everything in the settings. Only disappointment. Game optimization is getting worse and worse.
